how he enjoyed the breakfast egg, that timid
—but always truthful—young curate replied:
"Parts of it were excellent, sir!"
Now isn't that just like saying that such-andsuch a cigarette is mild? Mildness in tobacco
is not to be despised,but is it the me plus ultra,
the summum bonum, the ...in plain English. is

that all you ask from your cigarette? We
think not.
Take Chesterfield's mildness for granted,
and get the full relish of its rich, real taste
under your tongue. That's its difference from
the common run—all the difference between
plus and minus. Chesterfields are mild ...and
yet they satisfy!

Students who were on the Campus in the year 1926-27 will remember the discussion carried at HopIns and in the City by the ,sensational criticism of the conference
voiced by Ir. Broadus Mitchell in a
published interview in the Baltimore
Sun. An assembly was devoted to
a. debate on the subject between Dr.
Broadus Mitchell and Robert I,.
Bull, President of the Hopkins Y.
M. C. A. Considerable interest was
taken by the student body in the
open forum which followed. All
this was followed by research into
the social side of the conference and
an article in the NEWS-LETTER entitled "Who put the Garbage in Dr.
Mitchell's Bed?"

Students who were on the Campus in the year 1926-27 will remember the discussion carried at HopIns and in the City by the ,sensational criticism of the conference
voiced by Ir. Broadus Mitchell in a
published interview in the Baltimore
Sun. An assembly was devoted to
a. debate on the subject between Dr.
Broadus Mitchell and Robert I,.
Bull, President of the Hopkins Y.
M. C. A. Considerable interest was
taken by the student body in the
open forum which followed. All
this was followed by research into
the social side of the conference and
an article in the NEWS-LETTER entitled "Who put the Garbage in Dr.
Mitchell's Bed?"
